title: These Chromebooks will support Steam for Chrome OS at launch
content:
Google has been working on bringing Steam support to Chromebooks for some time now. In late December, a merged commit on the Chromium Gerrit revealed that Steam for Chrome OS was just around the corner. While that is yet to happen, we now know which Chromebooks will be the first in line to support Steam

The post These Chromebooks will support Steam for Chrome OS at launch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In a recent code change posted over at Chromium Gerrit, Google has released an initial list of Chromebooks that will support Steam at launch.
